data.title: The most interesting arcade games released in 2008
data.meta_description: See the most interesting arcade games released in 2008.
data.text:
Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures

Arcade 04 January 2008

Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures is a 2D platformer with elements of a logical game produced by In Images studio in Krakow. Players will learn more about the adventures of a nice turtle - Turtiks, who must save the little turtle so that they don't fall into traps set by cunning villains.

PC

Ernest Colt: Western Shooter

Arcade 14 January 2008

Ernest Colt is an arcade shooting in the atmosphere of Western Europe, for which the development team of Artifex Mundi studio is responsible. The plot of the game shows the adventures of the title character whose ambition is to become a sheriff. In order to do this, the young cowboy has to face dangerous bandits, wild animals and even demonic spirits.

PC

Boogie Bunnies

Arcade 16 January 2008

A logical game, referring to the Bejeweled series and the classic Tetris. We try to control the dancing rabbits by matching the same colored creature.

PCX360

The Wonderful End of the World

Arcade 25 January 2008

Arcade game, in which we travel a dozen or so varied boards absorbing elements of the environment. Initially, the main character has the ability to absorb only small objects. With time, however, we absorb people, cars and even skyscrapers. The player's task is to collect as many points as possible within a specified time.

PC

Bomberman Land Touch! 2

Arcade 29 January 2008

Continuation of the popular arcade and logic game. This time we can choose between battle mode and various mini-games, of which there are forty in total.

NDS

Rez HD

Arcade 30 January 2008

A new version of the popular shooter, characterized by unconventional graphics and sound layer. We play the role of a hacker who breaks into a computer system.

X360

The Monkey King: The Legend Begins

Arcade 31 January 2008

A classic scrolling shooter set in Ancient China. We play the role of the title king, fighting against the monsters harassing the land.

Wii

Downstream Panic

Arcade 05 February 2008

Logical-arcade game, in many ways referring to the cult series "Lemmings". We save water by drilling tunnels and avoiding various threats.

PSP

Puppy Palace

Arcade 05 February 2008

A game for the youngest DS users, where we run a pet shop. We play with 48 different breeds of puppies, also taking care of their basic needs.

NDS

Poker Smash

Arcade 06 February 2008

A combination of logic-arcade game and fun based on the principles of classic poker. We take care of the elimination of objects visible on the screen, finding the best possible layouts.

X360

Matchstick Puzzle by DS

Arcade 12 February 2008

A logic-arcade game in which matches are used to perform subsequent moves. There are more than 150 different puzzles to solve, played on three difficulty levels.

NDS

Barnyard Blast

Arcade 13 February 2008

Funny two-dimensional platformer. The player takes on the role of a brave pig, taking on the forces of darkness and defeating six different worlds (including a cemetery and a ghostly castle).

NDS

Audiosurf

Arcade 15 February 2008

Audiosurf is a game created by only one person, an independent developer - Dylan Fitterer. The artist himself classified it as a "music-adapting puzzle racer", which should be understood as a "logical racing game matching the music".

PC

Balloon Pop

Arcade 20 February 2008

A logical and arcade game, referring to the rules of the titles from the "Busta-Move" series. We destroy balloons appearing on the screen, matching objects of the same color.

Wii

Little Gamers

Arcade 20 February 2008

A two-dimensional platfm where we brutally deal with hippies, zombies and ninja warriors, among others. We use more than thirty different tools of annihilation to defeat them.

X360

Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards

Arcade 25 February 2008

Re-edition of the three-dimensional platformer, which originally appeared on Nintendo 64. We play the role of the title ghost, setting out to search for fragments of broken crystal.

Wii

Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection

Arcade 26 February 2008

Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection is a pinball simulation item. It is a de facto continuation of the game, released in 2004. In addition to the reflection of the metal ball with flippers, this product also offers its users the opportunity to learn about the history of one of the leading companies, producing, among others, pinball tables.

PS2PSPWii

TriggerHeart Exelica

Arcade 27 February 2008

Triggerheart Exelica is an arcade shooter. We land on a moving board, and on the screen appear endless hosts of enemies that we have to exterminate.

PCSwitchX360

Puzzle Guzzle

Arcade 27 February 2008

Logical-arcade game, referring to the rules of the classic "Tetris". Our task is to arrange the falling blocks so that they form specific geometric shapes.

PSP

The Idolmaster Live For You!

Arcade 28 February 2008

Spin-off of the first installment of The Idolmaster series, released in 2007 on Xbox 360. The production abandons most of the managerial and strategic options of the original, focusing on fun in the form of a classical music-rhythmic game, with an uncomplicated feature campaign. The title offers a total of more than seventy different songs and three difficulty levels.

X360

DropCast

Arcade 01 March 2008

Logical-arcade game, referring to the rules of the classic "Tetris". Our task is to fill up the opponent's board using characteristic blocks.

NDS

Imagine Figure Skater

Arcade 04 March 2008

A game about figure skating. We develop the character of our choice by participating in skating competitions. In our free time we solve simple mini-games.

NDS

Ninja Reflex

Arcade 04 March 2008

Ninja Reflex belongs to the party-games genre. This time, however, instead of showing off frying virtual pancakes or playing bowling, the creators from the Nunchuck Games studio offered us mini-games in which we will be able to show off the skills of a real warrior.

PCWiiNDS

Rocketmen: Axis of Evil

Arcade 05 March 2008

Rocketmen: Axis of Evil is a position dedicated to shooting enthusiasts with a large dose of fast action, full of unexpected twists and turns.

X360PS3

Arctic Stud Poker Run

Arcade 06 March 2008

Arctic Stud Poker Run is a humorous arcade game produced by Game Refuge studio. The company is responsible for creating such arcade games as: Rampage World Tour and General Chaos.

PC

Fading Shadows

Arcade 07 March 2008

In Fading Shadows, Ivolgamus' arcade and logic game, we face countless puzzles whose successful solution will save the fantastic heavenly kingdom.

PSP

Winx Club: Mission Echantrix

Arcade 07 March 2008

A platform game based on the popular animated series. We move to a magical world, helping brave wizards to defeat the evil Lord Baltor.

NDS

George of the Jungle

Arcade 11 March 2008

Not too complicated platformer, in which we play the character of the title character. The game parodies the adventures of the famous Tarzan in a very clear way. The interesting graphic design (cel-shading technology) is also worth mentioning.

PS2WiiNDS

Octomania

Arcade 11 March 2008

Arcade game in which we combine octopuses of the same color to eliminate them from our own board. We can play with a computer opponent or other player.

Wii

Clever!

Arcade 17 March 2008

A logic-arcade game in which the player's task is to construct various types of instruments with the use of assigned objects. There are more than 100 puzzles to solve.

NDS

TiQal

Arcade 26 March 2008

A puzzle game, referring to Bejeweled or Tetris rules. We are dealing with the liquidation of blocks of the same color, thus saving a village belonging to the Mayan civilization.

X360

Yumi's Odd Odyssey

Arcade 27 March 2008

A remake of a colorful platformer from the SNES console, in which the heroine Yumi, trapped in a strange world, travels through a series of dangerous levels. In order to free herself from the trap, the girl uses mainly her intelligence and a rubber line for fish, which acts as a whip.

PCPSPNDSPSV3DS

Teenage Zombies: Invasion of the Alien Brain Thingys!

Arcade 28 March 2008

Arcade game in which we take control over one of the title teenage zombies. We move towards an uneven fight against an aggressive alien race.

NDS

Ed's Farm

Arcade 28 March 2008

Ed's Farm is a production aimed primarily at younger users of the Nintendo DS console. This is evidenced, among other things, by the protagonists of this platformer - they are fluffy rabbits, which have poor chances for a peaceful sleep without our intervention.

NDS

de Blob

Arcade 01 April 2008

Unusual combination of a logical game and a three-dimensional platformer. We control a huge sphere of paint, trying to paint objects in the area and at the same time avoiding various threats.

PCXONEPS4SwitchWii

Double Sequence

Arcade 01 April 2008

A combination of logical game and arcade. We deal with matching blocks in an attempt to destroy the devastating destruction of the galaxy's virus.

NDS

Cory in the House

Arcade 15 April 2008

A simple arcade game based on a comedy series for children. We set out to rescue the inhabitants of the American capital, who were hypnotized by a certain madman.

NDS

Emergency Mayhem

Arcade 15 April 2008

Emergency Mayhem is an arcade game in which we drive our cars through the crazy streets of Crysis City, carrying out various missions.

Wii

Zombie Shooter

Arcade 16 April 2008

Zombie Shooter is a dynamic action game with cRPG elements produced by Sigma-Team studio. The player directs the actions of the hero who must save humanity from the plague of the undead, which is the result of a failed scientific experiment. The creators have prepared several fun variants, including Survive and Gun Stand modes.

PC

Rocky & Bullwinkle

Arcade 16 April 2008

Rocky & Bullwinkle is a position in which the characters known from television compete in various mini-games.

X360

Noitu Love 2: Devolution

Arcade 18 April 2008

An extremely dynamic "walking brawl" in which we defend the cities of the future against the army of a certain professor Darnacus. The game surprises with its fast and interestingly designed gameplay - the player can move endless sequences of blows to maintain a high pace of action. Production includes seven stages, many boss battles and a lot of secrets.

PC

D.W.A.R.F.S.: Training Camp

Arcade 21 April 2008

D.W.A.R.R.F.S.: Training Camp is a set of three mini-games prepared by Artifex Mundi studio, whose heroes are dwarves known from D.W.A.R.R.F.S... Players have the opportunity to take part in the training of their favourite players - Bingo, Hoplo and Macro, improving their extraordinary skills. The game combines arcade and logical elements.

PC

Wii Fit

Arcade 25 April 2008

Wii Fit is a production developed and published by Nintendo, which is a combination of a game with a program for improving physical condition and shaping the figure. This is one of the programs created by a Japanese producer to show that games can not only entertain, but also contribute to improving the intellectual and physical fitness of players. Wii Fit focuses on this second aspect.

Wii

Cooking Academy

Arcade 26 April 2008

Cooking Academy is an uncomplicated arcade game dedicated to the culinary art by Big Fish Games, a company that produces casual and browser-based titles of different genres. She is responsible for creating, among others, the Cake Mania series and a series of simple adventure-logical games, Mystery Case Files.

PC

Ancient Taxi

Arcade 28 April 2008

Ancient Taxi is a simple arcade game by the development team of Alawar Entertainment. The player plays the role of the pilot of a prehistoric air taxi, and his task is to transport passengers between different corners of the labyrinth of caves.

PC

Castle of Shikigami III

Arcade 29 April 2008

Dynamic shooting with action observed from a bird's eye view. We choose one of the ten available heroes, facing an uneven fight against hordes of enemies.

Wii

Pokemon Puzzle League

Arcade 06 May 2008

Re-edition of the classic arcade and logic game from the Nintendo 64 console. We deal with arranging colorful blocks, interacting with characters known from the TV series about the adventures of Pokemons.

Wii

Gyrostarr

Arcade 12 May 2008

Dynamic shooting, in many ways referring to the principles of the cult "Tempest". We control a spacecraft, eliminating enemy fighters and collecting energy balls.

Wii

LostWinds

Arcade 12 May 2008

Innovative two-dimensional platformer. We play the role of a boy named Toku, living in a fantastic world harassed by an evil spirit - Balasar. One day our protagonist meets Enril, the Spirit of the Wind, enchanted in crystal, who lends him his ability to control this element.

PCWii

Pop

Arcade 12 May 2008

Very simple arcade game. The task of the participants of the game is to pierce the soap bubbles appearing on the screen, which allows to enlarge the point state.

Wii

Defend your Castle

Arcade 12 May 2008

Not too complicated action game, in which we play the role of the castle commander. We defend this object against attacks from hordes of barbarians. As the game develops, we upgrade the castle by building new towers.

Wii

Mister Slime

Arcade 13 May 2008

An arcade game for the youngest players, in which we take control of a funny-looking creature, beating forty different boards.

NDS

Rocketmen: It Came from Your Uranus

Arcade 14 May 2008

Official game accessory to "Rocketmen: Axis of Evil". We explore three new levels (including the planet Saturn), exterminating enemies appearing on the board.

X360PS3

Assault Heroes 2

Arcade 14 May 2008

Assault Heroes 2 is the sequel to the popular shooting in classic style. Our goal is, as before, to destroy endless waves of enemy units.

X360

Toki Tori

Arcade 19 May 2008

A combination of a two-dimensional platformer and a logical game. We take control over a funny nestling, beating the boards prepared by the manufacturers. The action is observed from the side, thanks to which we can see a significant part of the board and plan the action in advance.

PCSwitchPS3ANDiOSWiiWiiU3DS

Gumboy Tournament

Arcade 19 May 2008

Gumboy Tournament is the second production of the Gumboy games series, the development of which is overseen by the Czech company Cinemax. Again, in our opinion, it is to direct the movement of a small rubber ball, which, as it rolls around, travels through successive locations.

PC

Star Soldier R

Arcade 19 May 2008

A classic shooting, in which we take control over a futuristic fighter. Within the time limit, we aim to eliminate as many enemy units as possible.

Wii

Pirates: The Key of Dreams

Arcade 20 May 2008

A simple agility game, in which we take control over a pirate ship. We attack other units of this type, looking for a valuable artifact at the same time.

Wii

Emma in the Mountains

Arcade 21 May 2008

An adventure game for the youngest users of the DS console. This time the title Emma sets off on a trip to the mountains, trying to establish why the marmots did not wake up from winter sleep.

NDS

Emergency Heroes

Arcade 27 May 2008

Emergency Heroes is a car game that is an exclusive title for the Wii console. We save lives here - we play the role of police officers, firefighters or emergency workers.

Wii

Commando: Steel Disaster

Arcade 30 May 2008

Commando: Steel Disaster is an interesting clone of a classic shooter called Metal Slug. We take on the role of a daredevil named Storm, destroying everything on his way.

NDS

Critter Round-Up

Arcade 30 May 2008

An arcade and logic game, in which the player's task is to build fences and drive animals to specific places. The game is hindered by the presence of various types of predators.

Wii

Nikita: Tajemnica Skarbu Piratow

Arcade 30 May 2008

Not very demanding platformer, in which we play the role of the clever fox Nikita. Our task is to find a magical sabre, as well as the title treasure of pirates.

PC

Prot√∂thea

Arcade 30 May 2008

A futuristic shooter in which we play the role of a spacecraft pilot. We eliminate enemy units, while at the same time seeking to thwart the plans of a political faction.

Wii

Roogoo

Arcade 04 June 2008

Roogoo is a product combining a logical game and a fast decision making arcade, developed by Spidermonk development studio.

PCX360WiiNDS

NovaStrike

Arcade 05 June 2008

Novastrike is a title intended primarily for lovers of traditional slot machines. Tiki Games, a company established in 2006, is responsible for creating this game. Distribution of the program takes place via PlayStation Store.

PS3

Reaxxion

Arcade 10 June 2008

Variation on the theme of classical Arkanoid. We control the platform filled with liquid metal and bounce the balls, clearing the boards of multi-colored blocks. We collect bonuses that affect the course of the game and fight against bosses.

PC

Blast Works: Build, Fuse & Destroy

Arcade 10 June 2008

Blast Works: Build, Fuse & Destroy is a side-scrolled shooting game created by Budcat Creations (a developer with Madden for EA, Psychonauts or Medal of Honor: Vanguard) and released by Majesco. The game is distinguished by the fact that it allows you to build your own ships, levels and enemy vehicles. In addition, players can "absorb" parts and weapons from destroyed enemy vehicles in order to build their own unique combat machine during the mission.

Wii

The Legendary Starfy

Arcade 10 June 2008

A funny platformer telling about the adventures of the title Starfy, the golden star. The hero has to help an astronaut-clad rabbit who has serious problems with pirates.

NDS

Frogger 2

Arcade 11 June 2008

An arcade platform game with a mountain view, a refreshment of the original 1984 version, produced by Voltex. In the game we move frogs to the other side of the board within a certain time limit. In addition to levels full of obstacles and enemies, we can take adventures in feature mode. There is also a multiplayer mode for four players.

X360

Fireteam Reloaded

Arcade 11 June 2008

Fireteam Reloaded is a debut project of the American development studio Pixel Mine Productions. We are dealing here with a network action game, in which the players divided into several teams compete with each other.

PC

Dolphin Willy

Arcade 12 June 2008

Dolphin Willy is an arcade racing game created by the Wasted Studios development team in cooperation with Play-publishing publishing house. The player directs the actions of a friendly marine mammal and takes part in exciting races on underwater tracks. Production is characterized by a simple control system and is addressed to younger customers.

PC

Soul Bubbles

Arcade 13 June 2008

Soul Bubbles is another great proposition for those who love combining and heading. We play the role of a young shaman who saves souls.

NDS

Arkanoid DS

Arcade 17 June 2008

Remake the cult arcade game. We control a spacecraft-like platform, bouncing balls and neutralizing the bricks visible on the screen.

NDS

Secret Agent Clank

Arcade 17 June 2008

Secret Agent Clank is an arcade 3D platformer with the hero of the Ratchet & Clank series in the title role. A small robot sets out to rescue his friend, unjustly accused of crimes he did not commit. The player's task is to help him discover the truth and reveal who is behind the whole thing. The game was produced by High Impact Games studio, responsible for Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters.

PS2PSP

Garfield Gets Real

Arcade 17 June 2008

Arcade game in which we supervise the film with the participation of the title Garfield. So we perform spectacular tricks, beating seven different boards.

WiiNDS

Asterix Brain Trainer

Arcade 27 June 2008

A logic-arcade game that helps to develop logical thinking skills. We play the role of a young Justforkix, joining a series of challenges under the watchful eye of Asterix and other Gauls.

NDS

ZEN Pinball

Arcade 07 July 2008

Virtual pinball by ZEN studio. The production offers four extensive tables, improved ball physics and a multiplayer option. In this version all available tables are available in 3D graphics.

PS3ANDiOS3DS

Wonder World Amusement Park

Arcade 08 July 2008

A simple arcade game in which we join a variety of mini-games. At the same time we are exploring the theme park, divided into five different thematic zones.

WiiNDS

Schizoid

Arcade 09 July 2008

Innovative shooting, in which two people control colourful spaceships. The primary goal is to eliminate alien ships of the same color.

X360

Major League Eating: The Game

Arcade 14 July 2008

A fun arcade game, in which we enter the food on time competition, facing many of the masters of this discipline. We play alone or with another player.

Wii

Space Chimps

Arcade 15 July 2008

An arcade game for younger players, based on an animated film of the same title. We take control of brave chimpanzees by exploring the surface of a foreign planet.

PCX360PS2WiiNDS

Puchi Puchi Virus

Arcade 15 July 2008

Logical-arcade game. Our task is to control a virus that poisons the human body by matching germs of the same colour.

NDS

Underwater Attack

Arcade 15 July 2008

Shooting, in which we take control of an armed shark and cross the depths in search of enemy units. We have about twenty main stages to complete.

NDS

Crazy Chicken: Atlantis

Arcade 15 July 2008

Crazy Chicken and Lost Atlantis is an arcade platformer from the popular Moorhuhn Jump'n Run series. This time the pinnate hero crosses tropical islands and sea depths in search of the treasures of the legendary Atlantis. The title was produced by the German company Phenomedia.

PCNDS

Order Up!!

Arcade 22 July 2008

Arcade game that allows you to run your own restaurant and prepare dishes, representing cuisines of different countries of the world.

PS3Wii3DS

I-Fluid

Arcade 22 July 2008

Original platform game. We are leading the world's most ordinary drop of water and we have to guide it through a number of stages, full of surprises and dangers.

PC

1942: Joint Strike

Arcade 23 July 2008

A remake of classic shooting. We play the role of a pilot of a World War II airplane, dealing with the mass extermination of enemy troops. We observe the action from a bird's eye view.

X360PS3

Pong Toss: Frat Party Games

Arcade 28 July 2008

An arcade game focused on playing with other players. Our task is to throw the balls into the cups visible on the screen before the members of the opposing team manage to do so.

Wii

Garfield's Fun Fest

Arcade 29 July 2008

A fun arcade game with the participation of the title male. Garfield and his dog companion embark on a quest for a magic pond, solving puzzles, collecting treasures and defeating enemies along the way.

NDS

Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved 2

Arcade 30 July 2008

Continuation of the popular shooting. We take control of a small spacecraft. We deal with destroying enemy ships resembling various geometric figures.

X360

PixelJunk Eden

Arcade 31 July 2008

The third game from the "PixelJunk" series. This time we control a small self-adhesive ball, trying to reach the higher parts of the trees visible on the screen.

PCPS3

Rock Blast

Arcade 05 August 2008

An arcade and logic game, in which our task is to remove the accumulation of various colored boulders. We control the funny dinosaurs, beating about a hundred boards.

NDS

Braid

Arcade 06 August 2008

An innovative two-dimensional platformer, in which, in addition to jumping to other shelves, we also deal with the manipulation of the passage of time. Time travel opportunities depend on the game world you are currently visiting.

PCX360PS3

Bangai-O Spirits

Arcade 12 August 2008

A classic two-dimensional shooting, in which we deal with mass extermination of enemies, alone or with the participation of other players. A big attraction is the built-in editor, thanks to which we design our own levels.

NDS

Bionic Commando Rearmed

Arcade 13 August 2008

Remake of classic two-dimensional shooting. We play the role of the title commander, equipped with a very useful mechanical hand. We will defeat subsequent boards, killing enemies.

PCX360PS3

Galaga Legions

Arcade 20 August 2008

The next installment of the popular shooting, in which with the help of a tiny spacecraft we deal with the mass extermination of enemy units.

X360

Alien Crush Returns

Arcade 26 August 2008

Re-edition of the classic pinball simulation. We control the metal ball, contributing to the increase in point score. All the tables presented are thematically related to the atmosphere of science fiction.

Wii

Space Invaders Get Even

Arcade 26 August 2008

Spcae Invaders is one of the oldest brands among video games. This time, however, we are not in defending humanity, but we are on the side of the invaders who have decided to pay the bills for more than thirty years of humiliation.

Wii

N+

Arcade 28 August 2008

N+ is a platform game. Here we play ninja, whose only purpose is to collect gold. In order to collect them we have to wade through levels attacked by enemies.

PSPNDS

Gradius Rebirth

Arcade 02 September 2008

Classic two-dimensional shooting. Flying with a small spacecraft we shoot everything and everything shoots at us.

Wii

Shred Nebula

Arcade 03 September 2008

A spectacular shooting in which events are observed from a bird's eye view. We play the role of a spacecraft pilot, eliminating enemy units.

X360

Hell's Kitchen: The Video Game

Arcade 09 September 2008

Hell's Kitchen: The Video Game is a game based on the American culinary show Hell's Kitchen, whose protagonist is chef Gordon Ramsay. Its production was taken care of by the Ludia company, and the release is the responsibility of Ubisoft concern.

PCWiiNDS

Globey: On The Roll!

Arcade 10 September 2008

An arcade and logic game, a result of cooperation between the Dutch Engine Software studio and the Polish Reactor Entertainment. The plot depicts the adventures of the title dragon, Globey, who tries to free his fellows imprisoned by insidious trolls and restore order in the fantastic land of Dragon's Land.

PC

Bomberman Blast

Arcade 12 September 2008

He plays arcade and logic with the title role of Bomberman. We go through labyrinths and skillfully place bombs to eliminate other players. An unquestionable attraction of the game is a network multiplayer for eight people.

Wii

Line Rider 2: Unbound

Arcade 16 September 2008

Line Rider is a commercial version of a simple Flash game created by Bostjan Cadez. It is very difficult to say which genre this product belongs to, because even the author describes his work as more a "toy" than a game.

PCWiiNDS

Bratz Ponyz 2

Arcade 16 September 2008

A game designed for little girls. Young users have the opportunity to interact with ponytails, beautifying the appearance of the animals and giving them new accessories.

NDS

Kirby Super Star Ultra

Arcade 22 September 2008

Another part of Kirby's adventures. As usual, we are dealing here with a combination of adventure elements with dynamic action and multicolored world.

NDS

Snowman

Arcade 22 September 2008

Snowman is an arcade 3D platform, produced by the Koszalin company Rhema Press. The player directs the actions of the title character, who, at the command of Santa Claus, collects gifts scattered in the snowy land. The title was created for the youngest viewers and introducing them to the Christmas atmosphere.

PC

Mega Man 9

Arcade 22 September 2008

The next installment of the adventures of the brave Mega Man. We move in a two-dimensional environment, fighting against both standard opponents and much stronger bosses.

X360PS3Wii

Babysitting Mania

Arcade 23 September 2008

A simple arcade game in which we play the role of a babysitter. We have to look after both infants and teenagers, overcoming about 100 different levels.

NDS

Pipe Mania

Arcade 23 September 2008

Pipe Mania (2008) is a puzzle game that requires players to reflex and think fast. The title is a new version of the game with the same title, which has won millions of followers all over the world.

PCPS2PSPNDS

Wario Land: Shake It!

Arcade 26 September 2008

Wario Land: Shake It is the next installment of the adventures of the black character Wario, who once again tries to put his wicked plans into practice.

Wii

Prey the Stars

Arcade 30 September 2008

An arcade-logical game, modelled on the cult "Katamari Damacy". We take control of a funny-looking dog by devouring items on the screen.

NDS

Astro Avenger II

Arcade 03 October 2008

Astro Avenger II is a continuation of the space shootout published in 2004, known in Poland under the title Star Avenger. Players will get to know the fate of the galaxy's inhabitants, who, after entering the second Golden Age, began to dynamically expand their sphere of influence in the Universe, which attracted the attention of a dangerous alien race.... The only hope for mankind is a talented star fighter pilot and a new secret weapon.

PC

Crash Bandicoot: Mind over Mutant

Arcade 07 October 2008

Crash Bandicoot: Mind over Mutant is another part of a long series. We take on the role of the title genetically modified rodent to defeat the eternal enemy, Dr. Neo Cortex.

X360PS2PSPWiiNDS

Go, Diego, Go! Great Dinosaur Rescue

Arcade 09 October 2008

An arcade puzzle game based on the animated series Go, Diego, Go! by High Voltage Software. Diego kindergarten goes on a trip to a museum, where he moves in time to the era of dinosaurs. Little Diego decides to help the toddlers of dinosaurs to find their parents. The game is based on a series of mini-games, which include puzzles, matching elements and other attractions. Game designed for younger players.

PCPS2WiiNDS

World of Goo

Arcade 13 October 2008

World of Goo is a logic-arcade game produced and published by Kyle Gabler and Ron Carmel, a two-person development team from the 2D Boy studio. The game, designed exclusively for one player, consists in building various constructions of gelatinous slurry balls, i.e. the title Goo, which is permanently disturbed by gravity and other laws of physics. The title, characterized by specific visual setting and original situational humour, was considered one of the most original games of 2008.

PCSwitchANDiOSWii

Bratz Girlz Really Rock

Arcade 13 October 2008

Bratz is a series of games aimed primarily at young girls who dream of designing in fashion. In this version we go to a summer camp, to start our own rock band, among other things.

PS2WiiNDS

Tak and the Guardians of Gross

Arcade 14 October 2008

Tak and the Guardians of Gross is a platformer created thanks to THQ's cooperation with American television Nickelodeon. Once again, the hero of the game is the boy Tak, who is helped in the struggle with adversity by a not too clumsy colleague named Lok. The position was produced by Avalanche Software studio.

PS2Wii

Littlest Pet Shop: Garden

Arcade 14 October 2008

Littlest Pet Shop: Garden is another cosy game aimed at little girls. The player takes care of funny animals, aquires new accessories for them and solves simple mini-games.

NDS

Littlest Pet Shop

Arcade 14 October 2008

Littlest Pet Shop is a game for girls aged 6-12, where we interact with funny crafted animals. In your free time, you'll acquire new accessories and play simple mini-games.

PCWii

Littlest Pet Shop: Jungle

Arcade 14 October 2008

Littlest Pet Shop: Jungle is a game for girls aged 6-12, in which we are busy interacting with playfully crafted animals in the jungle. You'll acquire new accessories and play simple mini-games.

NDS

Littlest Pet Shop: Winter

Arcade 14 October 2008

Littlest Pet Shop: Winter is a game for girls aged 6-12, where we are busy interacting with playfully crafted pets in a winter setting. Meanwhile, you can earn new accessories and play simple mini-games.

NDS
